TABLE.NAME: astra
TABLE.COMMENT: Store all Astra exercise rounds (Moodle activity instances) in this table. (Rounds are called course modules in A+.)

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course id that this Astra activity belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name that is displayed to users.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the activity (exercise round). Used by Moodle feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of creation time.

FIELD.NAME: ordernum
FIELD.COMMENT: Order for listing the exercise rounds. Smaller comes first.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Ready = 0. Hidden = 1. Maintenance = 2.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale (scales not used in Astra). It is called grade, not maxgrade or maxpoints due to Moodle compatibility.

FIELD.NAME: remotekey
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique module key in the exercise service server. (In exercise service course configuration, it is called 'key'.)

FIELD.NAME: pointstopass
FIELD.COMMENT: Min points to pass the exercise round.

FIELD.NAME: openingtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Submissions are not allowed before the opening time.

FIELD.NAME: closingtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Submissions after the closing time are late: they may be prohibited or they may gain reduced points.

FIELD.NAME: latesbmsallowed
FIELD.COMMENT: Are late submissions allowed?

FIELD.NAME: latesbmsdl
FIELD.COMMENT: Late submissions deadline. Must be a later date than closingtime.

FIELD.NAME: latesbmspenalty
FIELD.COMMENT: Late submissions penalty: multiplier of points to reduce, as decimal. 0.1 = 10%

INDEX.NAME: remotekey
INDEX.COMMENT: Unique false because it might only be unique within a course.

TABLE.NAME: astra_categories
TABLE.COMMENT: Each learning object belongs to a category.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Ready = 0. Hidden = 1. No total points = 2.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name that is displayed to users. Name should be unique within a course.

FIELD.NAME: pointstopass
FIELD.COMMENT: Min points to pass a category.

TABLE.NAME: astra_lobjects
TABLE.COMMENT: Learning objects: base class table for exercises and chapters. Each object belongs to a round.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Ready = 0. Hidden = 1. Maintenance = 2. Unlisted = 3.

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Category ID. Each learning object belongs to a category.

FIELD.NAME: roundid
FIELD.COMMENT: Exercise round ID.

FIELD.NAME: parentid
FIELD.COMMENT: If null, the object is listed under the round. If parent is set, the chapter is listed under the parent object.

FIELD.NAME: ordernum
FIELD.COMMENT: Order for listing the learning objects under the round. Smaller comes first.

FIELD.NAME: remotekey
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique exercise key in the exercise service server. ('key' in exercise service configuration.) Should be unique within the round.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name that is displayed to users.

FIELD.NAME: serviceurl
FIELD.COMMENT: URL of the exercise service for this chapter.

FIELD.NAME: usewidecolumn
FIELD.COMMENT: If 1 (true), the info column is removed in chapter/exercise pages in order to have more space for the content.

KEY.NAME: parentid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to another learning object.

INDEX.NAME: remotekey
INDEX.COMMENT: Unique false because it might only be unique within a round.

TABLE.NAME: astra_exercises
TABLE.COMMENT: Exercise that accepts submissions and sends them to the serviceurl for grading.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key required by Moodle, otherwise unnecessary since lobjectid functions as a unique key.

FIELD.NAME: lobjectid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to learning object id.

FIELD.NAME: maxsubmissions
FIELD.COMMENT: Max number of submissions allowed. Zero for no limit.

FIELD.NAME: pointstopass
FIELD.COMMENT: Min points to pass the exercise.

FIELD.NAME: maxpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Max points available in the exercise.

FIELD.NAME: gradeitemnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle gradebook item number. 0 is reserved for the exercise round and each exercise needs a unique item number within the round.

FIELD.NAME: maxsbmssize
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum submission file size in bytes for one submitted file. Zero for no limit.

FIELD.NAME: allowastviewing
FIELD.COMMENT: Is an assistant (non-editing teacher) allowed to inspect submissions in this exercise? 1 = yes, 0 = no.

FIELD.NAME: allowastgrading
FIELD.COMMENT: Is an assistant (non-editing teacher) allowed to edit feedback and points for submissions in this exercise? 1 = yes, 0 = no.

INDEX.NAME: lobjectid
INDEX.COMMENT: One-to-one relationship between exercises and learning objects base table.

TABLE.NAME: astra_chapters
TABLE.COMMENT: Course chapters offer and organize material as one-page chapters. Exercises can be embedded in chapters.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key required by Moodle, otherwise unnecessary since lobjectid functions as a unique key.

FIELD.NAME: lobjectid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to learning object id.

FIELD.NAME: generatetoc
FIELD.COMMENT: Generate table of contents, 1 = yes, 0 = no.

INDEX.NAME: lobjectid
INDEX.COMMENT: One-to-one relationship between chapters and learning objects base table.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Initialized = 0. Waiting/not graded but sent to exercise service = 1. Ready/graded = 2. Error = 3.

FIELD.NAME: submissiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp. When was the submission received?

FIELD.NAME: hash
FIELD.COMMENT: Random string.

FIELD.NAME: exerciseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Exercise learning object ID (lobjectid).

FIELD.NAME: submitter
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user ID of the submitter.

FIELD.NAME: grader
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user ID of the grader (if manual feedback or grading is used).

FIELD.NAME: feedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Machine-generated feedback.

FIELD.NAME: assistfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Assistant feedback.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade (points) that the submission is given.

FIELD.NAME: gradingtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp. When was the submission graded?

FIELD.NAME: latepenaltyapplied
FIELD.COMMENT: Late submission penalty applied to this submission. Number between 0 and 1, null if not late.

FIELD.NAME: servicepoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Points that the submission was given in the exercise service (possibly on a different scale).

FIELD.NAME: servicemaxpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Max points that the exercise service used in grading.

FIELD.NAME: submissiondata
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional submission data. Usually stored as JSON.

FIELD.NAME: gradingdata
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional grading data. Usually stored as JSON.

INDEX.NAME: hash
INDEX.COMMENT: Unique false because there is a random chance it is not unique.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle course ID

FIELD.NAME: apikey
FIELD.COMMENT: Secret API key needed to authorize the use of the HTTP course API in the exercise service server.

FIELD.NAME: configurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Configuration URL from which the course exercises configuration is downloaded for automatic setup.

FIELD.NAME: sectionnum
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle course section number (0-N) which new activities are added to.

FIELD.NAME: modulenumbering
FIELD.COMMENT: Numbering style for exercise rounds.

FIELD.NAME: contentnumbering
FIELD.COMMENT: Numbering style for exercises (content under rounds).

FIELD.NAME: submitter
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user ID of the submitter who is affected by the deviation.

FIELD.NAME: exerciseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Exercise ID (lobjectid) of the affected exercise.

FIELD.NAME: extraminutes
FIELD.COMMENT: Minutes to add to the normal deadline.

FIELD.NAME: withoutlatepenalty
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 = true (no late penalty), 0 = false

TABLE.NAME: astra_maxsbms_devs
TABLE.COMMENT: Student-specific deviations/extensions to exercise max submissions limits.

FIELD.NAME: submitter
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user ID of the submitter who is affected by the deviation.

FIELD.NAME: exerciseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Exercise ID (lobjectid) of the affected exercise.

FIELD.NAME: extrasubmissions
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of submissions to add to the normal submission limit.
